config.taskName: Add needs triage label to new issue
Replace needs author feedback label with needs attention label when the author comments on an issue
Remove no recent activity label from issues
Remove no recent activity label when an issue is commented on
Close stale issues
Add no recent activity label to issues

parameters.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback but has not had any activity for **4 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 3 days of this comment**.

config.taskName: Close duplicate issues

parameters.comment: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It will be closed for housekeeping purposes.

config.taskName: Add a CodeFlow link to new pull requests
Add needs author feedback label to pull requests when changes are requested
Remove needs author feedback label when the author responds to a pull request
Remove needs author feedback label when the author comments on a pull request
Remove needs author feedback label when the author responds to a pull request review comment
Remove no recent activity label from pull requests
Remove no recent activity label when a pull request is commented on
Remove no recent activity label when a pull request is reviewed
Close stale pull requests
Add no recent activity label to pull requests

parameters.comment: This pull request has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback but has not had any activity for **7 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 7 days of this comment**.

config.taskName: Automatically merge pull requests
config.label: AutoMerge

config.taskName: Mark issues that need tagging fixed
Remove tag fix label from issues with fixed tags
Label PRs and mark fix committed automatically
remove tag fix from duplicates

parameters.titlePattern: ^\s*Bug Report \(IF I DO NOT CHANGE THIS THE ISSUE WILL BE AUTO-CLOSED\)\s*$

config.taskName: Close issues with no title fix

parameters.comment: Hi! Thanks for attempting to open an issue. Unfortunately, your title wasn't changed from the original template which makes it very hard for us to track and triage. You are welcome to fix up the title and try again with a new issue.

config.taskName: Close issues with nothing in the body

parameters.comment: Hi! Thanks for attempting to open an issue. Unfortunately, you didn't write anything in the body which makes it impossible to understand your concern. You are welcome to fix up the issue and try again by opening another issue with the body filled out.

config.taskName: add team when a second is needed
Remove Needs-Second from closed PRs.
Announce a fix has been released
config.prReply:
:tada:`${pkgName} ${version}` has been released which incorporates this pull request.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/${owner}/${repo}/releases/tag/${version})
* [Store Download](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9n8g5rfz9xk3?cid=storebadge&ocid=badge)
config.issueReply:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #${prNumber}, which has now been successfully released as `${pkgName} ${version}`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/${owner}/${repo}/releases/tag/${version})
* [Store Download](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9n8g5rfz9xk3?cid=storebadge&ocid=badge)

config.taskName: Ask for Feedback Hub link

parameters.comment:
Hi there!

Can you please send us feedback with the Feedback Hub with this issue and paste the link here so we can more easily find your crash information on the back end?

Thanks!

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18221333/62478757-b69d0d00-b760-11e9-9626-1fa33c91e7c5.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18221333/62478649-6de55400-b760-11e9-806e-5aab7e085a9f.png)

config.taskName: Pull the Help-Wanted tag if something goes into PR
Helper to mark as duplicate

parameters.comment: Hi! We've identified this issue as a duplicate of another one that already exists on this Issue Tracker. This specific instance is being closed in favor of tracking the concern over on the referenced thread. Thanks for your report!

config.taskName: Ask for Feedback Hub link via comment trigger

parameters.comment:
Hi there!

Can you please send us feedback with the [Feedback Hub](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/send-feedback-to-microsoft-with-the-feedback-hub-app-f59187f8-8739-22d6-ba93-f66612949332) with this issue? Make sure to click the "Start recording" button, then reproduce the issue before submitting the feedback. Once it's submitted, paste the link here so we can more easily find your crash information on the back end?

Thanks!

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18356694/140811502-a068f78b-89d2-4587-925a-73e19652b830.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18356694/140811557-cdc22a0f-fa6a-4f6a-953e-73b51f5548a3.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18221333/62478649-6de55400-b760-11e9-806e-5aab7e085a9f.png)

parameters.comment: Hi! We've identified this issue as a duplicate of one that exists on somebody else's Issue Tracker. Please make sure you subscribe to the referenced external issue for future updates. Thanks for your report!
